summary: Just a RaceMenu preset of my Dragonborn's wife.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Here I am, back with yet another preset. Seems to be all I do anymore. Well, aside from small NPC & follower mods that I never share because there are so many actually good ones on here. Bakura the Raven is the wife of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72680/?]Godhrar[/url] and is a Nord with a powerful [i]Witch Soul[/i]. Not exactly lore-friendly but whatever. She took a turn for Farming & Hunting after abandoning her life as a Witch, and married the Dragonborn whom she met in Solitude.

[b]**Notice**
[/b]Updates have been suspended on this for the time being. Lost the presets I had made so I'm going to have to remodel them.Â 

[b]Requires[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?]WSCO - Windsong Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69353/?]Dragon Eyes
[/url]
[b]Recommended
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21454/?]Haven Bag
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/?]Scarf and Gugel
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49608/?]Pauldrons and Greaves
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49292/?]Kankaraya[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21572/?]Blood Witch Armor
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15579/?]BiPolar Blade
[/url][/center]
author: Mitoshi
